snippet: The Florida Panthers ended one of the longest playoff droughts in major North American sports Thursday night despite a 4-2 loss to the Washington Capitals.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Florida Panthers and Washington Capitals earn playoff berth after Philadelphia Flyers eliminated Buffalo Sabres with 2-1 win; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: The Florida Panthers ended one of the longest playoff droughts in major North American sports Thursday night despite a 4-2 loss to the Washington Capitals.

headline.seo: Sabres Out as Panthers and Caps Win Berths
headline.main: Sabres Out as Panthers and Caps Win Berths
headline.print_headline: Sabres Out As Panthers And Caps Win Berths
